column4: anyone have any idea why my monitor goes into power save while playing doom 3, quake 3, or quake 4 after 5 or 10 mins of play?
anyone here at all play doom 3 or any id software games on breezy?
don't know why it's happening, but check screensaver prefs
particularly the power stuff
have done that same issue its not power save.. its just black in general i turned power save off on my monitor etc..
/msg bot please if you're just "fishing"
could it be something to do with the nvidia drivers i have installed? i read something about others having issues on ubuntu similar
possibly.  i'm neither an nvidia owner nor a linux gamer, so i doubt i could help you. sorry
any ideas of channels i could get help in specific gaming on ubuntu?
forum section on gaming is a good bet
i hae googled for like 3 days etc.. no luck
i meant ubuntuforums.org
ubuntu ships w/ a 2.6 kernel :-/
uname -r
uname -r
bleh sorry thinking oldly hehe can i get the source then?
search for linux source and get the relevant one
in synaptic/other apt tool i mean
gay it doesn't have mine i have 2.6.12-10
so get the linux-source-2.6.12 package
found it :D
i think i know my issue which is the gay ass nvidia drivers that are supplied in the 3rd party repositories
that's nice.  ease up on the gay-bashing though....
no i will say gay as much as i want!!!!!!!!
